text: [Music]
hello i'm victor a cloud support
engineer here at the AWS office in Cape
Town South Africa today I'm going to
show you how to share a subnet in a V PC
with another EWS accounts using the AWS
resource access manager service
let's get started the AWS Ram service
enables you so easily and securely share
AWS resources with any AWS account
within your AWS organization the account
that owns the subnets that you share is
called the owner accounts while the
accounts that receives the shared
subnets is called the participants
accounts notes subnets can be shared
only across accounts that are in the
same AWS organization you must first
enable sharing within your AWS
organizations if you haven't already
done so you enable sharing from the
master accounts the master accounts
doesn't have to be the owner accounts it
is the account that you used to create
your organization well the owner and
participants accounts belong to the EWS
organization
logging to the AWS management console
for the master accounts and then
navigates to the RAM console in the
navigation pane open the settings page
select the tick box for enable sharing
with AWS organizations and choose save
settings after you do this you'll create
a resource and specify the principles
that you share them with to do this
navigate to the RAM console of the owner
accounts in our case the owner account
is the same as the master accounts in
the navigation pane under shared by me
choose resources select creates resaw
share for name you can provide any mini
ones for resources you can optionally
specify the subnets that you want to
share otherwise you can just create the
resource and then share the subnets
later let's create only the resource for
now for principals you specify account
IDs for the participants account which
must be in the same organization choose
create Swiss O'Shea now that you have to
resew CA you can go ahead and share the
subnets you can share the subnet edit
from the RAM console or from the BBC
console I will walk you through both
ways first for sharing the subnets using
the RAM console navigates there select
the resource share that she created
earlier choose modify on the resources
select subnets choose any subnets that
you want to share with the participant
accounts for this resource I choose Save
Changes if you would like to share the
subnets using the V PC console open the
Amazon PPC console in the navigation
pane
on the Left choose subnets selects the
subnets that you want to share and then
choose actions she submits select the
research she you created for this
purpose and choose share subnets in both
cases the subnet should appear in the
participants accounts under the list of
subnets into the PC console just like
any other subnets let's check this out
in the participants accounts go to the
PC console page of the participants
accounts in the correct region in the
navigation pane choose subnets all
subjects including the shared subnets
will be displayed here as you can see so
view the ID of the accounts owner you
can check the subnets description for
each of them to view this information in
the RAM console navigates to the RAM
console page in the navigation pane
under shared with me choose shared
resources you will see the shared
subnets and the ID of the accounts owner
you can go ahead and launch resources in
the shared subnets from the participants
account thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
you
